transcription.text: The cool combination of pale green and pristine white combined in this pantsuit stands in direct contrast to the dusty and dirty backdrop of Dungatar. This design exemplifies the modern European aesthetic of leading couture houses such as Dior and Chanel in the 1950s.

work.title: Period mint cashmere jacket with ivory wool twill trousers worn by Amanda Woodhams as Nancy Pickett in The Dressmaker
